rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {FNA1201, FNA1211, PTG1511, PTG1512, PTG1531, PTG1542, PTG2513, PTG2514, PTG2523, PTG2524, PTG3515, PTG3516}

proh: Must not have passed any of the following PTG1511, PTG1512, PTG1531, PTG1542, PTG2513, PTG2514, PTG2523, PTG2524, PTG3515 or PTG3516
unitName: Painting as an interdisciplinary practice C
description: This unit gives students who are not taking painting as a major study the opportunity to continue to develop the practice and theory of Painting as a means of contemporary creative expression. By providing the means to continue to increase their level of competence within the Painting discipline it forms a sound conceptual and technical basis for an understanding of Painting as a discipline. It also lays the groundwork for developing interdisciplinary approaches and extending the discipline of Painting into wider fields of practice.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
